title: South Korea’s Central Bank Vows to Stabilize Markets Amid Political Turmoil
description:
South Korea’s central bank vowed to stabilize financial markets and highlighted the importance of “uninterrupted implementation” of key fiscal and economic measures, in its first statement since lawmakers voted to impeach President Yoon Suk Yeol.

“The Bank of Korea intends to utilize all available ...

title: Kim vows to implement 'toughest' anti-US policy: Improving soldiers' mental toughness to bolstering military
description: Kim vows to implement 'toughest' anti-US policy: Improving soldiers' mental toughness to bolstering military North Korea's leader Kim Jong Un has threatened the United States by suggesting to implement the toughest anti-US policy. title: North Korea’s Kim Jong Un threatens ‘toughest and aggressive’ anti-US policy before Donald Trump’s return
description: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un during a five-day plenary meeting of North Korea's ruling Workers’ Party that concluded on Friday (December 27), delivered a sharp criticism of the United States, labeling it as “the most reactionary state that regards anti-communism as its invariable state policy.” K...
